who.title: Who We Are
who.p1: Balance Accounting & Tax Consultancy is a professional firm based in Abu Dhabi, managed by professionals with more than 18 years of experience, providing comprehensive accounting and tax advisory services to businesses across the UAE.
who.p2: We support organizations in maintaining accurate financial records, ensuring regulatory compliance, and building strong financial foundations that enable sustainable growth.
who.p3: With deep expertise across accounting, taxation, statutory reporting, and internal controls, we simplify complex financial processes and deliver clarity, structure, and confidence in financial decision-making.

vision.vision_text: To be a trusted accounting and tax advisory firm in UAE, recognized for clarity, balance, and reliability, while supporting sustainable, forward-thinking businesses through compliant and transparent financial decision-making.
vision.mission_text: To simplify financial complexity by delivering accurate accounting, compliant tax solutions, and structured financial processes that allow businesses to focus on growth and sustainability.

servicesHero.label: Our Services
servicesHero.title: Professional Accounting & Tax Solutions
servicesHero.subtitle: Structured, compliant, and practical financial services designed to support business growth across the UAE.

items.title: Accounting & Bookkeeping
items.text: We provide accurate and organized accounting and bookkeeping services to ensure your financial records are complete, up to date, and compliant with UAE regulations. Our services support day-to-day transactions, general ledger management, reconciliations, and smooth month-end and year-end closings.

items.title: Financial Reporting
items.text: We prepare clear and reliable financial reports that give you full visibility into your business performance. Our reporting services include monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and compliance with statutory requirements.

items.title: UAE VAT Services
items.text: We support businesses with end-to-end UAE VAT compliance, including registration, return preparation, reconciliation, and advisory. Our approach ensures accurate filings, minimizes risks, and helps businesses remain fully compliant with Federal Tax Authority requirements.

items.title: Corporate Tax (CT)
items.text: We assist businesses in meeting UAE Corporate Tax obligations through accurate tax calculations, compliance support, and filing preparation. Our services are designed to ensure compliance while aligning tax reporting with your financial records and business activities.

items.title: Payroll Service
items.text: Our Payroll Preparation Service ensures accurate calculation, proper documentation, and full compliance with UAE labor and regulatory requirements before salaries are processed and paid. We prepare payroll data systematically to support timely payments, reporting, and audit readiness.

items.title: Audit Support Services
items.text: Our Audit Support Services assist businesses in preparing complete and accurate documentation and coordinating the audit process with approved and qualified third-party auditors. We act as a liaison to ensure a smooth, efficient, and well-organized audit experience.
